title: Game Development: Total Trash Island
description: Developed a first-person shooter in Unity for the Ubisoft Australia Game Jam 2024 around the theme 'trash', where the player eradicates enemies invading the island. Responsible for all enemy AI systems in the game.
highlights: Engineered enemy AI featuring 2D billboard sprites in a 3D environment — an unconventional approach that gave the game a distinct, wacky visual identity.
Implemented pathfinding and animation behaviors using Unity's NavMesh and animation systems under tight game jam constraints.

title: Distrosub
description: Architected and deployed scalable AWS cloud infrastructure (EC2, S3, ECS, RDS, Elasticache) and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for a music streaming platform serving thousands of users.
highlights: Built production-ready full-stack application using Node.js and Next.js with Progressive Web App (PWA) capabilities, successfully deployed to Apple App Store and Google Play Store.
Led Agile sprint planning, conducted code reviews, and mentored a 5-person engineering team while reporting directly to the founder.
toolsUsed: AWS, Node.js, Next.js, TypeScript, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, PWA, React

title: Internship: TechFlouu
description: Developed and shipped production features for TechFlouu's platform using Next.js, TypeScript, React Native, and Node.js, improving user engagement and platform performance.
highlights: Delivered end-to-end full-stack features with comprehensive technical documentation following best practices.
Collaborated effectively in a fully remote, multi-national Agile environment across different time zones.
toolsUsed: Next.js, TypeScript, React Native, Node.js, REST API, Git

title: Game Development: Old Man Zeus
description: Developed a fast-paced VR action game in just 9 days for VR Jam 2. As the once-mighty Zeus, now retired, the player defends their home from hordes of minotaurs using legendary lightning powers — charging bolts via electrical outlets and summoning Olympian allies.
highlights: Designed and implemented core VR gameplay loop including charge-up lightning mechanics, interactive electrical outlet interactions, and celestial alarm summoning system.
Delivered a polished, fully playable VR experience as Lead Gameplay Programmer within a 9-day jam deadline using Unity XR Interaction Toolkit.

title: Internship: Gradient Academy
description: Delivered full-stack features for Gradient's EdTech platform using Next.js, TypeScript, and Django REST Framework, directly contributing to 5x user growth (25,000 to 125,000) within 6 months.
highlights: Architected and shipped three production features: real-time interactive exercise system, AI-powered chat application with streaming responses, and collaborative flashcard system with spaced repetition.
toolsUsed: Next.js, TypeScript, Django, Python, REST API, PostgreSQL, Git

title: Internship: MoneyFitt SG
description: Developed and optimized mobile application features for MoneyFitt's FinTech platform using Angular, Ionic, and TypeScript, enhancing user experience and app performance.
highlights: Built RESTful API integrations and optimized backend services using Spring Boot and Java for improved mobile responsiveness.
toolsUsed: Angular, Ionic, TypeScript, Spring Boot, Java, REST API, Git

title: Game Development: UE5 Third Person Shooter Prototype
description: Designed and programmed a third-person shooter prototype in Unreal Engine 5 using Blueprint visual scripting, exploring animation systems, UI design, and AI enemy development as a learning-focused solo project.
highlights: Implemented third-person shooter mechanics, animation state machines, and HUD UI entirely within Unreal Engine's Blueprint system.
Built AI enemy behavior trees to populate the prototype world and deepen understanding of UE5's AI and animation pipelines.

title: Hackathon: UQUIZZLE
description: Won 1st place at UQCS Hackathon 2024 (35+ teams). Engineered a Chrome extension for lecture recordings using React.js, implementing responsive UI/UX design and state management.
highlights: Led frontend architecture decisions and UI/UX design, delivering a polished product within 48-hour deadline.
toolsUsed: React.js, JavaScript, Chrome Extensions API, HTML5, CSS3, Git

title: Hackathon: PEOPL.
description: Won 1st place in Youth Empowerment Track at Garuda Hacks 4.0. Built a community discussion web application using React.js and TypeScript with focus on accessibility and responsive design.
highlights: Implemented component-driven architecture and reusable UI components following React best practices.
toolsUsed: React.js, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, Responsive Design, Git

title: Game Development: Tickets Please
description: Led gameplay programming for a team-built game, responsible for implementing all player interactions and enemy AI systems using Unity and C#.
highlights: Engineered adaptive enemy AI that dynamically adjusts behavior based on player interactions, creating emergent and responsive gameplay scenarios.
Owned the full gameplay programming scope as Lead Gameplay Programmer, delivering core mechanics and AI systems within team deadlines.

title: Game Development: VR Space Shooter
description: Developed immersive VR game application using Unity and C#, implementing physics-based interactions, AI behavior systems, and 3D spatial audio for enhanced user experience.
highlights: Engineered custom enemy AI using state machines and Unity's NavMesh pathfinding system.
toolsUsed: Unity, C#, Unity XR Toolkit, 3D Graphics, Game Development

title: Web Development: OKK UI 2022
description: Developed responsive web application using React.js and Tailwind CSS, creating reusable component library and implementing mobile-first design principles.
highlights: Created wireframes and prototypes in Figma, collaborating with stakeholders to align on project requirements.
toolsUsed: React.js, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, Responsive Design, Figma, Git

title: Computer Graphics: Minecraft World Generation
description: Built procedural terrain generation system using C++ and OpenGL, implementing Perlin noise algorithms, real-time lighting with shadow mapping, and optimized rendering pipeline.
highlights: Developed PCF shadow mapping, dynamic day/night cycle, and view frustum culling for performance optimization.
toolsUsed: C++, OpenGL, GLSL, GLFW, GLM, Graphics Programming

title: Web Development: ACB-ISBE REVAMPED
description: Led full-stack development of web application using Django, Python, and JavaScript, implementing RESTful APIs and responsive frontend with Tailwind CSS.
highlights: Collaborated in Agile team environment, delivering mobile-responsive design and AJAX-powered dynamic content.
toolsUsed: Django, Python, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, REST API, AJAX, PostgreSQL, Git

title: UI/UX Design: STUDENTXCEO INTERNATIONAL SUMMIT 2022
description: Designed user interfaces and user experience flows for international summit website, creating wireframes, prototypes, and design system documentation.
highlights: Conducted user research and usability testing, collaborating with development team to ensure design implementation accuracy.
toolsUsed: Figma, Whimsical, UI/UX Design, Wireframing, Prototyping, User Research
